cmd::LogFileSection

cmd::LogFileSection Class Reference

#include <LogFile.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 LogFileSection (LogFile *lf, std::string sectName)
 ~LogFileSection ()

Detailed Description

Remarks:
Section group in a log file. This is essentially a helper class for creating a new section which will "pop" itself when it goes out of scope.

This works well for automatically closing the section when going out of scope. However, it should be noted that if there is a system crash, the stack will get released, but the heap may be orphaned. This means that the LogFileSection's destructor will be called while the log file is open, thereby closing the section. Just be aware of this if using the class.
